inclusion.criterion: undergoing investigative cystoscopies for the monitoring of recurrence of urinary tract UC
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Positive diagnosis for primary or recurrent bladder tumour within the past 5 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to provide a voided urine sample of the required minimum volume
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to comply with study requirements
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Prior genitourinary manipulation (flexible or rigid cystoscopy / catheterisation, urethral dilation)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Recent history of glomerulonephritis, nephrosis or other renal inflammatory disorders
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. He had a severe urethral stricture that was treated with a flexible cystoscopy in the ICU.
